rules.description: cmd - return | /Applications/Kitty.app/Contents/MacOS/kitty --single-instance -d ~ #open terminal
alt - h | MOVE WINDOW | -m window --focus west #focus window
alt - j | MOVE WINDOW | -m window --focus south
alt - k | MOVE WINDOW | -m window --focus north
alt - l | MOVE WINDOWS | -m window --focus east
shift + alt - h | SWAP WINDOWS | -m window --swap west
shift + alt - j | SWAP WINDOWS | -m window --swap south
shift + alt - k | SWAP WINDOWS | -m window --swap north
shift + alt - l | SWAP WINDOWS | -m window --swap east
shift + alt + cmd - h | RESIZE | -m window --warp west #move window
shift + alt + cmd - j | RESIZE | -m window --warp south
shift + alt + cmd - k | RESIZE | -m window --warp north
shift + alt + cmd - l | RESIZE | -m window --warp east
cmd + alt - n |  # create desktop, move window and follow focus

to_if_alone.shell_command: /usr/local/bin/yabai -m space --create && id=$(yabai -m query --displays --display | jq '.spaces | max') &&  yabai -m window --space ${id:-1} &&  yabai -m space --focus ${id:-1}

rules.description: cmd + opt + shift - n | move window to next display and follow
cmd + alt - p | SIP |  yabai -m space --focus prev
cmd + alt - 1 | -m space --focus 1
cmd + alt - 2 | -m space --focus 2
cmd + alt - 3 | -m space --focus 3
cmd + alt - 4 | -m space --focus 4
cmd + alt - 5 | -m space --focus 5
cmd + alt - 6 | -m space --focus 6
cmd + alt - 7 | -m space --focus 7
cmd + alt - 8 | -m space --focus 8
cmd + alt - 9 | -m space --focus 9
cmd + alt - 1 | -m space --focus 1
cmd + alt - 2 | -m space --focus 2
cmd + alt - 3 | REQ SIP | -m space --focus 3
cmd + alt - 4 | REQ SIP | -m space --focus 4
cmd + alt - 5 | REQ SIP | -m space --focus 5
cmd + alt - 6 | REQ SIP | -m space --focus 6
cmd + alt - 7 | REQ SIP | -m space --focus 7
cmd + alt - 8 | REQ SIP | -m space --focus 8
cmd + alt - 9 | REQ SIP | -m space --focus 9
cmd + alt - x |  # send window to recent space
shift + cmd - 1 |  # Send window to space 1
shift + cmd - 2 |  # Send window to space 2
shift + cmd - 3 |  # Send window to space 3
shift + cmd - 4 |  # Send window to space 4
shift + cmd - 5 |  # Send window to space 5
shift + cmd - 6 | # Send window to space 6
shift + cmd - 7 | # Send window to space 7
shift + cmd - 8 |  # Send window to space 8
shift + cmd - 9 |  # Send window to space 9
shift + alt + cmd - 0 |  # Send window to space 10
ctrl + alt - down | RECENT DISPLAY | -m display --focus recent #focus monitor
ctrl + alt - right | -m display --focus prev
ctrl + alt - 1 | -m display --focus 1
ctrl + alt - 2 | -m display --focus 2
ctrl + alt - 3 | -m display --focus 3
cmd + alt + shift - x |  # send window to recent display and follow focus
cmd + alt + shift - n |  Move window to prev space and follow
cmd + alt - n |  Move window to prev space and follow
cmd + alt + shift - . |  MOVE WIN -> DISP | follow window previous monitor
ctrl + cmd + shift - 1 | MOVE WIN -> DISP
ctrl + cmd + shift - 2 |  MOVE WIN -> DISP 2
ctrl + cmd - 3 | MOVE WIN -> DISP 3
shift + ctrl - a | -m window --move rel:-20:0 #move window
shift + ctrl - s | -m window --move rel:0:20
shift + ctrl - w | -m window --move rel:0:-20
shift + ctrl - d | -m window --move rel:20:0
shift + alt - a | -m window --resize left:-20:0 #increase window size
shift + alt - s | -m window --resize bottom:0:20
shift + alt - w | -m window --resize top:0:-20
shift + alt - d | -m window --resize right:20:0
shift + cmd - a | -m window --resize left:20:0 #decrease window size
shift + cmd - s | -m window --resize bottom:0:-20
shift + cmd - w | -m window --resize top:0:20
shift + cmd - d | -m window --resize right:-20:0
ctrl + alt - h | -m window --insert west #set insertion point in focused container
ctrl + alt - j | -m window --insert south
ctrl + alt - k | -m window --insert north
ctrl + alt - l | -m window --insert east
cmd + alt + shift - 0 | -m space --balance #balance size of windows
alt - r | -m space --rotate 90 #rotate tree
cmd + alt - y | -m space --mirror y-axis #mirror tree y-axis
cmd + alt - x | -m space --mirror x-axis #mirror tree x-axis
alt - d | WINDOW | -m window --toggle zoom-parent #toggle window parent zoom
alt - / | WINDOW | picture-in-picture this window
alt - [cmd] - f | WINDOW TOGGLE | -m window --toggle zoom-fullscreen
ctrl + alt - b | WINDOW TOGGLE | -m window --toggle border
alt + [cmd] + shift - f | WINDOW TOGGLE | -m window --toggle native-fullscreen
ctrl + alt + cmd + [shift] - r | WINDOW TOGGLE | split horz|vert
[ctrl] + alt + [cmd] + [shift] - t | WINDOW TOGGLE | float / unfloat window and center on screen
ctrl + alt + [cmd] + [shift] - s | WINDOW TOGGLE | -m window --toggle sticky #toggle sticky
ctrl + alt + [cmd] + [shift] - b | LAYOUT | -m space --layout bsp
ctrl + alt + [cmd] + [shift] - f | LAYOUT | -m space --layout float
ctrl + alt + [cmd] + [shift] - r | HUP | launchctl kickstart -k "gui/${UID}/homebrew.mxcl.yabai"
ctrl + alt + cmd - z | -m space --toggle {padding,gap} | # Zoom all (toggle desktop offset)
cmd + alt + shift - up | -m window --grid 1:1:0:0:1:1 #make floating window fill screen
cmd + alt + shift - left | -m window --grid 1:2:0:0:1:1 #make floating window fill left-half of screen
cmd + alt + shift - right | -m window --grid 1:2:1:0:1:1 #make floating window fill right-half of screen
